issues.title: Paid Family Leave
issues.description: Strong advocate for comprehensive paid family and medical leave program, supporting workers' ability to care for family without losing income

issues.title: Minimum Wage Increase
issues.description: Supports raising federal minimum wage to $15 per hour to provide living wage for workers

issues.title: Healthcare Reform
issues.description: Supports expanding Affordable Care Act, reducing prescription drug costs, protecting Medicare and Medicaid

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Advocates for aggressive climate change mitigation, supports Green New Deal principles, renewable energy investments

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Supports comprehensive immigration reform with path to citizenship, opposes harsh border enforcement

issues.title: Child Nutrition Programs
issues.description: Long-time champion of expanding school lunch and nutrition programs, fighting child hunger

issues.title: Women's Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice advocate, supports protecting abortion access and funding for reproductive healthcare

issues.title: Education Funding
issues.description: Supports increased federal education funding, student debt relief, and expanded early childhood education
